title: Lessons Learned in Creating Investigative Centers
description: This tipsheet provides advice and lessons learned from experienced journalists on creating and running investigative reporting centers, including planning, fundraising, and editorial considerations. It covers key aspects such as determining the need for an organization, building collaborations, and ensuring transparency in financial operations.
